title: How to Add Custom Icons to Google Maps

steps.title: Go to https://www.google.com/maps/about/mymaps in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.google.com/maps/about/mymaps in a web browser. Use any web browser on your computer, such as Chrome, Edge, or Safari. Unfortunately, you can't add icons to a Google map on a phone or tablet.

steps.title: Click Get Started.
steps.content: Click Get Started . If you're not already logged in, you'll be prompted to do so now. Once you're signed in, you'll be able to view this custom map anywhere you log into your Google account. If you don't have a Google account, you can create one by clicking Sign up .

steps.title: Select a map or create a new one.
steps.content: Select a map or create a new one. Once you log in, you'll see a list of maps you've created and maps that were shared with you. Click a map to open it or click Create A New Map to make a new one .

steps.title: Find the location where you want to add an icon.
steps.content: Find the location where you want to add an icon. You can use the + and - buttons on the lower-right corner of the map to zoom in or out. Use your cursor to move up, down, left, or right of the map. Alternatively, search for a location using the search bar at the top of the page.

steps.title: Add a marker.
steps.content: Add a marker. Click the "Add marker" icon (the pushpin) at the top of the map (right below the search text field), then click the area of the map you want to place it.

steps.title: Name the marker.
steps.content: Name the marker. A pop-up box will appear as you place the pin. Type a name for the location (and an optional description), then click Save .

steps.title: Click the paint bucket icon on your location.
steps.content: Click the paint bucket icon on your location. Hover your mouse cursor over the name of the marker in the left panel, then click the paint bucket icon beside it. Alternatively, click the pushpin on the map, then click the paint bucket icon below the marker's name.

steps.title: Select an icon.
steps.content: Select an icon. Select an icon from the list, or click More Icons to choose from a larger library. To add a custom icon you've created , click Custom icon at the bottom of the icon library. You can then select a picture from the internet, your local storage, your Drive, a URL, your webcam, your photos, or something from Google Images.

steps.title: Click OK to add your icon.
steps.content: Click OK to add your icon. Your custom icon is now added to your map in Google Maps. To view your custom map and icons when you're on the go, open the Google Maps app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad, tap the Saved tab, then select Maps .
